item.description: December 28, 2022 Cleaned up and upgraded my nvim. Learning how to properly set up a virtual environment: here.
Assuming we already have RELOCID in place: There is a bool pretend_im_corev in gas/config/tc-riscv.c which sets the relocation as CORE-V. Then it gets checked and we set an ID for CORE-V (100):

CORE-V We have a static relocation in bfd/elfnn-riscv.c (perform_relocation) which switches on the instruction type and encodes the instruction. The way we were doing was we would have a R_RISCV_RELOCID as a case which would trigger a function, riscv_elf_custom_relocid() (the one similar to add/sub).
